author: paulhauner
content: Sigma Prime will be exiting their Pyrmont nodes in the coming day. I don't suspect this is of consequence to anyone.

author: kommstar
content: <@!301186049323958275> how does EF and co handle chaos testing for testnets? Would it make sense to have some sort of network that is kind of in flux with regard to key metrics that make the blockchain viable?

content: I'm not intimately familiar with the testing strategies employed generally.  Someone in this channel probably can explain it though.
